reporter_caption.center: SMITH v. MAUI COUNTY BOARD OF VARIANCE APPEALS, 26974 (Haw. 6-26-2008)

caption.center: JAMES R. SMITH, Claimant/Appellant-Appellant, v. MAUI COUNTY BOARD OF

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE SECOND CIRCUIT COURT (CIV. NO. 03-1-0440)
opinion.attorneys: James R. Smith, Claimant/Appellant-Appellant pro se on the motion.
opinion.panel: By: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, and DUFFY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION Upon consideration of Claimant/Appellant-Appellant James R. Smith's motion for reconsideration of the summary disposition order filed on May 30, 2008, and the record herein,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion is denied.Page 1
